summary: PURCHASED USED 06 MAXIMA IN AUG-SEP TIME FRAME.  VEHICLE HAD PROBLEMS WITH NOISE COMING FROM SUSPENSION EITHER FRONT OR BACK(UNKNOWN AT THE TIME).  NOISE NEVER WENT AWAY.  RECENT OIL CHANGE REVEALED REAR SUSPENSION REPLACEMENT BY GOODYEAR SERVICE REP.  CHECK WITH NHTSA AND FOUND OUT RECALL FOR POWER SEATS AND REAR SUSPENSION.  RECALL REPAIRS WAS NOT DONE TO CAR.   DOES DEALERSHIP REQUIRE KNOWLEDGE OF ALL RECALLS FOR USED VEHICLES.  *TR
